授業目的: To prepare students to be able to complete a thesis in English. Topics to be covered include choosing a subject and focusing on the core issues, research skills, essay organization, writing skills, citing sources, avoiding plagiarism and revising.
到達目標: To prepare students to be able to complete a thesis in English. Topics to be covered include choosing a subject and focusing on the core issues, research skills, essay organization, writing skills, citing sources, avoiding plagiarism and revising.
授業方法:
The course will be start by being taught online, and the students will be notified by email and on the message board how to access the lesson materials. Please be sure to check there for information regarding the class.

Lecture and group work

第2回: Review of the fundamentals of paragraph writing/Paragraph assignment
第3回: Introduction of the components of an essay
第5回: Parts of an essay/ Linking and connecting ideas
第7回: Choosing a topic and making an outline
第10回: The research paper - choosing a topic and developing ideas
第12回: Presentation of outline and first draft
第13回: Submission of second draft and editing
